DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 21 year 65 year age Subjects history migraine headache least 12 month Subjects receive acupuncture medical condition past 6 month . A negative pregnancy test childbearing female since acupuncture point may contraindicate pregnancy . Pregnancy test conduct MMC .
